ui.grav_wave_desc:
The black hole is unstable!
At regular intervals, it emits gravitational waves
that jostle any whales nearby.
ui.whale_body:
These space whales can sing! They are also the main source of Whale Dust.
Click to find out.
ui.MK2_dust_collector_desc: Collects Whale Dust from Whales at a faster rate
ui.whale_song_gatherer_desc: Collects Whale Songs from Whales. Produces a new resource: Song Essence
ui.converter_locked_body: You need to unlock this converter first
ui.building_locked_body: You need to unlock this building first
ui.dust_to_crystal_converter_description: Converts Whale Dust into Crystals at a rate of 1:1000
ui.crystal_to_wafer_converter_description: Converts Crystals into Wafers at a rate of 1:1000
ui.wafer_to_chip_converter_description: Converts Wafers into Chips at a rate of 1:1000
